message: Let's avoid drawn-out negotiations, Bob. A quick 90/10 split in my favor seems fair considering the inflation working against you.
Alice, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. Let's be reasonable - I'm proposing a 70/30 split.
Bob, let's find a compromise. I've lowered my ask considerably.  Time is literally money for you with this inflation, so I suggest taking this 65/35 split.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm losing money with every passing round, while you're holding out for an unreasonable share.  55/45 is my final offer.
